title: riot is fking bullying me, FREE TRINITYNL

replies.body: Looks like an incredibly deserved ban.

>Trinitynl: if you ping me i run down mid
Trinitynl: gg
Trinitynl: nah
Trinitynl: stupid mom
Trinitynl: is usimng internet
Trinitynl: im sorry %%%  

Threatening to feed, giving up and hate speech. And that is only 6 lines in. What a well deserved ban! Also the account Trinitynl has been banned since last July, why are you just now getting salty about it being banned?
The name looks familiar. I think they have been posting essentially the same post with different accounts.

Hello Fiirlius

The good news is that there is precedent for your situation. If you can get ALL FOUR of your queue-mates from both games to post in this thread that they reported as a joke and wish to rescind their report, and then send a ticket to support, there is a very real (non-zero) chance that you will be unbanned. 

See, some months ago, Riot Tantram gave that offer to another player, who was in a 5-person premade and had a friend report as a joke. Thus, precedent. That IS your situation, right?

Atleast you gave them a good laugh! 

https://giphy.com/gifs/lol-laughing-muttley-3oEjHAUOqG3lSS0f1C
Looks super mild to me, undeserved.
